description: These maps show all the red routes in London. Use these maps to plan your journey and find out if it will take you on a red route and, therefore, where stopping restrictions are in place.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["These maps show all the red routes in London. Use these maps to plan your journey and find out if it will take you on a red route and, therefore, where stopping restrictions are in place."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
You can identify the red routes by the red no-stopping lines and signs along the road.
